node.hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
node.hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊記錄，7 月 12 日開始喉嚨痛。其丈夫 ( 第 #1556 宗個案患者 ) 、女兒 ( 第 #1564 宗個案患者 ) 及外孫 ( 第 #1566 宗個案患者 ) 亦於同日確診。另外家人 ( 第 #1589 宗個案患者 ) 亦為確診個案。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and no travel history, and she developed sore throat on July 11. Her husband (patient #1556), daughter (patient #1564), and maternal grandson (patient #1566) tested positive for the virus on the same day.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Man Yue House, Tsz Man Estate
